title: Sell Scotch Malt Whisky Society (SMWS)
metaTitle: Sell SMWS Whisky | The Scotch Malt Whisky Society | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your SMWS bottles. We buy rare Scotch Malt Whisky Society codes including 29 (Laphroaig), 33 (Ardbeg), and 24 (Macallan).
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for SMWS Rare Releases and Vaults Collection.
introParagraph: The Scotch Malt Whisky Society bottles single casks identified by numeric codes (e.g., 29.123). We decipher the codes and pay top dollar for the most desirable distilleries.
whatWeDoNotBuy: SMWS Standard Green Bottles (Low value distilleries) - unless bulk
photoChecklist: Front label clearly showing the CODE (e.g. 29.200)
conditionFactors: Code Visibility: The number is everything. 33.xxx is Ardbeg (Gold). 4.xxx is Highland Park (Silver).
Fill: Older SMWS bottles (dumpy style) can have cork issues.
Box: Most SMWS bottles don't have boxes, but premium ones do.
pricingFactors: Distillery Code: We pay premiums for codes 24, 27, 29, 33, 53 (Caol Ila), 119 (Yamazaki), 132 (Karuizawa).
Age: 25+ year old bottles in the Vaults Collection are top tier.

faqs.question: How do I know what distillery it is?
faqs.answer: Google the code (e.g., 'SMWS 29') or send us a photo. 29 is Laphroaig, 33 is Ardbeg.

faqs.question: Do you buy the green bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, but value depends heavily on the code.

faqs.question: Do you buy membership allocations?
faqs.answer: Yes, looking to offload your monthly outturn? We buy lots.

faqs.question: What is the Vaults Collection?
faqs.answer: The premium range (black/gold boxes) usually high age or rare intensity.

faqs.question: Do you buy SMWS Rum/Gin?
faqs.answer: Yes, specifically Rum (R codes) and Cognac (C codes).

faqs.question: Do you buy Japanese SMWS?
faqs.answer: YES. Codes 119, 120, 124, 130, 132 are Japanese. We pay extremely well for these.
